adDetails: I'm able to dog sit your dog at my home. I also provide dog walking services. I can walk your dog for 1hour-30 mins. If you have 2 dogs I can walk both, rain or shine. I'm active, and walk my German shepherd all day, everyday. I also jog.If don't know where to board your dog, send me an email for more information,Your dog has to be dog friendly, and people friendly. For more information/phone number please send me an email and history of your dog, and how he or she behaves thanks. *Drop offs appreciated , pick ups can be arranged. *Drop offs/pick ups $5.00 to pay for gas. *San Jose east side and silver creek/berryessa available areas only. *Dog walks- 1 hour visit = $25.00 30m visit = $20.00 ($5.00 per dog) *Dog sitting-Includes walks and playtime,grooming , baths (please provide own food) 1 dog = $35.00/day ($5.00 per dog) (baths $15.00) Dog sitting what to expect- I will walk your dog(s) 3 times a day, 2 hours each walk. I will also update you on how your dog is doing, if you would like! I will also play and supervise them all throughout the day, everyday. Your dog will be bathed on the day he or she goes home if desired.Your dog must have all shots if there is any health concerns or medications that I should be aware of please list them in email thank you.
